Described Disease.Described Disease: Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome (HBOC)

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: BRCA1 protein levels were significantly reduced in fibroblasts carrying the BRCA1 c.5946C>T variant, compared to control samples.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not specifically mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type BRCA1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein levels exceeding the average of the control group.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein levels below 70% compared to control samples.
